Ingredients.1: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into chunks

Ingredients.3: 1 medium onion, sliced into 1/2-inch thick pieces

Ingredients.6: 3 medium zucchini and/or yellow squash, cut into thirds

Ingredients.10: 1 (5.6 ounce) package Knorr® Rice Sides™ - Chicken flavor, prepared according to package directions

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Directions.2: Season chicken, if desired, with salt and pepper. Heat oil in a deep, large skillet over medium-high heat and brown chicken. Add onion and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is almost tender, about 4 minutes. Stir in carrots, zucchini, and green onion; cook, stirring occasionally, for an additional 5 minutes.

Directions.3: Combine boiling water with Knorr rice sides in a 13x9-inch baking dish. Stir in vegetables and chicken. Cover tightly with aluminum foil.

Directions.4: Bake 30 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked and rice is tender.
